listing.listing_description:
_ Please note: Rates advertised are peak booking rates. Lower rates may be available for specific travel dates. Talk to you Villa Specialist today for more details. _

The glamour, gorgeous sea and glorious weather of the Costa del Sol are yours at Villa del Mar. Set on the beach near Marbella, this luxury oceanfront vacation rental is perfect for a sun-kissed destination wedding or a classic setting for a family reunion or other special occasion. The amenities of the Marbella Club close at hand give you the best of a resort, while six suite-style bedrooms are your own plush and private havens.

Your stay at Villa del Mar includes the services of a housekeeper and butler, as well as access to Marbella Club amenities such as golf, tennis and beach clubs, an equestrian center and restaurants and bars. The villa itself is equally well appointed, with a home theater, exercise room and a hot tub and sauna where you can indulge after a workout. Take advantage of the area’s famously beautiful weather and stretch out on a lounge chair on the terrace by the pool, step down to the ocean for a swim, and end the day with an al-fresco dinner and a cocktail from the indoor bar.

Brick terraces, traditional blue and white tile and serene water features give the villa’s exteriors a sense of timeless grace. Inside, sleek profiles, neutral tones and chrome and mirror finishes add modern touches, while silk carpets, gallery-worthy sculptures and paintings and wood-burning fireplaces appeal to every sense. Grand spaces like the entry hall and formal dining room impress with their Moorish-inspired motifs and generous dimensions, but there are also plenty of cozier, more intimate spots, like the breakfast area off the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the six bedrooms at Villa del Mar has an en-suite bathroom, making a holiday on the property as comfortable as one at a resort. There are four master suites, several of which have features like lounge areas, private terraces and fireplaces, one bedroom with two double beds and one with an outdoor shower and terrace access.

Start your trip to Spain with a flight into Malaga Airport, a 54 km drive from Villa del Mar. Marbella Club and the villa are located on Marbella Beach, putting you about 4 km from downtown Marbella, where you can browse the shops or join couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner at a local restaurant, and just under 5 km from Plaza de los Naranjos, the heart of old-town Marbella. Take a day trip to Puerto Banus Beach, 4 km away, Nikki Beach, 17 km away, for more sun and sand, or to Malaga, 66 km away, for incredible architecture and museums.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This palatial villa is secluded within a lush oasis outside Marrakech, with sweeping views of the Atlas Mountains. Virtually a resort unto itself, the villa includes a 6-bedroom main house, 4-bedroom guesthouse, superb private staff, and wide array of amenities for wellness, relaxation, and play. Drive about 15 kilometers to explore the ancient Medina neighborhood or stroll through the enchanting Menara Gardens.

Albacin blends vintage Moroccan and Andalusian exteriors with superb contemporary decor and technologies. An arcaded terrace extends from the main house with an ample alfresco dining area and lounge--perfect for privately catered feasts or cups of mint tea in the cool shade. Bask in the Mediterranean sun around the pool, and sip an afternoon drink at the pool house bar. Play petanque in the yard, practice your putt on the pro-grade green, and gather on the upstairs terrace for cocktails amid panoramic vistas. 

Inside, the luminous main living room features double-height ceilings and a gorgeous, 2-sided fireplace. Screen a favorite movie in the cavernous cinema or enjoy a playful night in the game room. Refresh yourself in the Hammam before retreating to your sumptuous bedroom suite.

The villa’s location balances serene privacy with easy access to Marrakech and some of the finest golf course and dining destinations in Morocco. Highlights of the world-class city include Yves Saint Laurent’s famous retreat, Majorelle Gardens, as well as the iconic Koutoubia Mosque. Families with kids will enjoy a day at Oasiria Marrakech Waterpark.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This palatial Moroccan villa is situated on the prestigious Ourika Road and enjoys beautiful views of the Atlas Mountains. Perched majestically on a lush and ample private estate, the villa features enchanting alfresco living areas, lavish and spacious interiors, and six bedroom suites accommodating twelve guests. Deluxe staff and services include a private cook and daily breakfast, and there is a well-equipped fitenss room. For momentous reunions with family and friends just minutes from outstanding golf and the historic heart of Marrakech, Masalva is an ideal choice.

Over one hectare of private estate sets the stage for exquisite days and nights in the Moroccan sun. Relax in elegant loungers and sitting areas around the expansive swimming pool and plunge into the sapphire-hued water. Gather for delicious alfresco meals in the rotunda pavilion. Ample green lawns and terraces provide space for special ceremonies or receptions, and lovely lighting lets you linger deep into the night.

Multiple sets of doors, some arched, some in French style, open into the villa's interior, allowing the home to breathe the delicious air. The large central lounge gazes up at soaring ceilings of gorgeous traditional brick, from which a spectacular chandelier dangles a dazzling luminescence on the living areas below. Gather here for evening aperitifs before repairing to the stunning dining table for twelve, which gazes out through arched doors at the pool.

The main house features a master suite with king bed as well as four guest suites: one with king bed, one with queen, and two with double beds. All of these rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys its own terrace and view of the pool, and its bathroom features a gorgeous stand-alone tub and shower. There is also a guest cottage with king bed, ensuite bathroom, and terrace.

Along with seclusion and privacy, this vacation rental enjoys outstanding proximity to the splendors of Marrakech. The artistic, architectural, and cultural riches of the city center are about eighteen kilometers away, and several world-class golf courses are nearby, including Ryads Al Maaden and Argan. Marrakech-Menara Airport is just fifteen kilometers from your door, making Masalva a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Capture panoramic ocean views from this multi-terraced home in the foothills of Cape Town’s Lion Head Mountain. Sip your morning coffee as you gaze out over the city’s vibrant coast and downtown area. After your private chef prepares breakfast, head out for an exciting day exploring the beaches, seaside restaurants, and downtown shopping in Cape Town. 

The Ellerman Estate is split into 2 separate villas, offering your group of 16 a second kitchen, pool, and lots of dining options. Follow parquet flooring through breezy open-concept interiors. Take a moment to enjoy each villa’s eclectic collection of art. Then head back outside for a cocktail while you watch the sun set over the Atlantic. When it cools down at night, warm up by the fireplace in the lounge.  

On quiet nights in, set the kids up with a movie or stream a new series in the media room. Take care of any lingering business in the office. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the Ellerman Hotel has a shared gym, as well as a wine gallery and spa. You’ll also appreciate complimentary airport transfers and daily housekeeping. 

The hike to the top of Lion’s Head takes about 90-minutes. At the top, you’ll be rewarded with the best views in the city, so make sure to bring a camera. If you’ve worked up an appetite, there’s a small cafe at the peak. If you can wait until after your dissent, lunch at Black Sheep is a great idea if you’d like to try some Cape signature dishes. At night, Victoria Road by Camps Bay Beach is always buzzing. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A five-minute walk from the gorgeous beachfront of Playa de Nagueles, this secluded three-bedroom is located within the Marbella Club Resort, along Spain’s prestigious Costa del Sol. Surrounded by lush tropical greenery, mature palms, and lush lawns, Villa Bel-Air Club is perfect for those who appreciate privacy, without the sacrifice of proximity to some of the areas best attractions. This luxurious two-level home is ideal for a family beach vacation, couples retreat, or a honeymoon with a little extra space. Nearby, you’ll find some of Marbella’s most beautiful beaches, golf courses, and the downtown core, as well as the amenities of the Marbella Club.

White-washed walls provide an elegant contrast to the rich wood tones, vibrant blues, and deep greens of Villa Bel-Air’s estate. Embracing its beautiful surroundings is something that Villa Bel-Air does with pride, using numerous openings, balconies, and imposing windows to highlight the amazing atmosphere. Inside, Spanish Colonial architecture strikes a soothing tone. The two master bedrooms are adorned with king-sized beds, lavish en-suite bathrooms, and direct access to private outdoor areas.

Villa Bel-Air Club comes outfitted with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area for six, and an alfresco set on the terrace. You’ll love spending your afternoons lounging poolside and sipping cocktails on the furnished patio. If you’d prefer the comfort of the air conditioning, there’s Wi-Fi, a media room, and a fireplace inside. And, during your stay, you’ll have shared access to the resort’s restaurants and bars, spa, swimming pool, and kid’s club.

Once you’ve spent some time on the sandy shores of Playa de Nagueles, and indulged in the luxurious amenities of the Marbella Club, head into town and embrace one of Spain’s most popular vacation destinations. If there’s a golfer in the group, Aloha and Las Brisas golf clubs are both within a few short kilometers. And, if you’re in the mood to shop, charter a private yacht, or enjoy dinner with an incredible view, the luxury marina of Puerto Banus is one of Marbella’s most prized destinations.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This palatial Moroccan villa is located within the Palmeraie, a large palm oasis on the northern edge of Marrakesh. Its prime location places you minutes of the city's heart and some of the region's finest golf courses. Enchanting alfresco terraces and dining areas, exquisite interiors, and five stunning bedrooms sleeping ten provide an ideal setting for family reunions, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Your vacation rental includes a cook, two kitchen clerks, and a butler.

The cloistered estate offers the ambiance of an enchanted garden, with lush gardens and palms enveloping an ample central terrace with twenty-five-meter swimming pool and colonnaded veranda. Savor the delicious Moroccan light and air while playing in the pool's sparkling waters and sunbathing on elegant loungers with parasols. Enjoy alfresco meals and afternoon refreshment under the pergola, and sunset cocktails on the upper-level patio with expansive oasis views. The lush lawns of these extraordinary grounds create a dreamy setting for weddings, receptions, or intimate gatherings with loved ones.

The spectacular interiors include superbly designed marble floors and pillars, traditional artwork and furnishings, and ample parlors. Each parlor possesses its own character, providing a diverse but uniformly beautiful and comforting setting for parties and meals. Several wood-burning fireplaces keep the home toasty at night. The modern, gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, while the gorgeous dining room invites you to delectable meals. The traditional Hammam steam chamber of Italian marble offers delicious, therapeutic refreshment.

The five bedroom suites all feature king beds, stunning ensuite bathrooms, and access to either a terrace or the gardens. Each possesses its own charms and advantages, and all provide serene privacy to individuals and couples.

At Villa Alaya, you'll enjoy an exquisite balance of secluded enchantment and excellent proximity to some of Morocco's finest attractions. PalmGolf Marrakech, Golf Amelkis, and Royal Golf Marrakech are an easy drive away, while the world-class dining and architectural masterpieces of central Marrakech are just five kilometers from your door. Marrakech-Menara Airport is only eleven kilometers away, making this villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular villa is located on the Route Amizmiz outside Marrakech. Designed by owner Philippe Taburiaux and built with the help of local craftsman using traditional techniques, the palatial home combines contemporary architectural principles and classical Moroccan features into a truly unique masterpiece, at once stylistically bold and in harmony with its sublime surroundings. Sixteen king bedroom suites, dedicated staff, and high-end amenities including a private spa give Palais Paysan the air of a secluded resort hotel, ideal for family reunions, weddings, or corporate retreats.

The villa's expansive terrace, enchanting gardens, and broad veranda enjoy panoramic and unobstructed views of the High Atlas Mountains and undulating foothills. Savor these dreamy vistas while floating in the sparkling swimming pool, basking in the sun on elegant lounge chairs under parasols, or sipping cool refreshments on pergola-shaded beds. Gather for meals on the lawn amid olive trees or on the upper veranda, or have tables arrayed on the pool terrace for an alfresco feast.

Inside, you'll discover a contemporary interpretation of antique elegance suffused with rustic naturalism. A restaurant-style dining venue invites you to delicious meals prepared by your private cook, and adjoins a sumptuous lounge with wood-burning fireplace and enchanting lighting for nighttime gatherings. Downstairs, the traditional spa includes a luxurious massage room.

The villa's bedrooms offer an extraordinary degree of privacy and tranquility to couples and individuals. There are eight suites on both the ground and upper floors, all with king beds and ensuite bathrooms. The ground-floor rooms open to terraces, and their beds can be converted into dual twins to accommodate diverse group arrangements. The upper-level rooms open to private balconies.

Palais Paysan balances rarefied seclusion with convenient proximity to the world-class golf and unparalleled splendors of Morocco. The old market of Jemaa al-Fna in the city's Medina quarter is about twenty-five kilometers away, while Golfers will enjoy the fairways at nearby Samanah and Argan Golf Resort. Marrakech-Menara Airport is just twenty-five kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
